EmailTemplate.name: DPS -DuPont™ Kevlar® Webbing and Mesh
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Webbing and Mesh
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar®.
DuPont® Kevlar® is available in continuous filament yarn, cut staple fiber, pulp and some roll goods forms. Most of these products are sold to converters who make fabrics, ropes and cables, composites or other high strength and high performance products for use by finished goods manufacturers.
Below is a list of DuPont customers that state on their website they manufacture netting or mesh. Please contact them for more information about their products.

To locate the list of companies that make commercial fabrics of Kevlar® for purchase, please copy and paste the web following web address into your web browser.
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=6&prodNum=6
DuPont Protection Solutions This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
